meanings: (신체) waist, (엉덩이 윗부분) the small of one's back
have the waist sliced in half
have the waist sliced in half
be unable to stretch one's waist

vlive.korean: 그걸로 이제 허리랑... 우리 의상 맞추는 거랑 똑같아 - 그래? And then they do the waist. It's just like our costumes. - Is it? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 22 🦊🐿(다시)
vlive.english: And then they do the waist. It's just like our costumes. - Is it?
